subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tony Parker scored 37 points in his best game of this postseason as San Antonio defeated the Grizzlies in four games and advanced to its first N.B.A. finals since 2007.
snippet: Tony Parker scored 37 points in his best game of this postseason as San Antonio defeated the Grizzlies in four games and advanced to its first N.B.A. finals since 2007.
